snippet.title: PolyKromos AVAILABLE NOW ON APP STORE & GOOGLE PLAY!
snippet.description:
AVAILABLE NOW ON THE APP STORE: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/polykromos/id1378156486?mt=8
AVAILABLE NOW ON THE GOOGLE PLAY STORE: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.AlienRealmStudio.PolyKromos

What makes orange? What makes green? What makes violet? PolyKromos is a simple and addictive casual game now available on iPhone and Android. Create all the colors of the rainbow by holding down one of the primary color buttons or by combining two buttons to create a secondary color. Tilt your device to avoid enemies and impassable barriers while collecting power-ups and achievements along the way. Collecting all 140 achievements will unlock secret free bonus content! See how quickly you can think and react while continually increasing speed across the beautiful and always unique environments. 

If you enjoyed this preview, please rate, comment, and subscribe for further updates. 

Facebook: facebook.com/alienrealmstudio
Instagram: @alienrealmstudio
Twitter: @alienrealm
